```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /srv/www
      name: web-data
      readOnly: true
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
 volumes:
 - name: web-data
 emptyDir: {} 
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /srv/www
      name: web-data
      readOnly: true
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
  - name: sync
    image: ocasta/sync-s3:latest
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /data
      name: web-data
      readOnly: false
    env:
    - ACCESS_KEY: "awskey"
      SECRET_KEY: "aws_secret"
      S3_PATH: "s3://my-awesome-website/"
      SYNC_FROM_S3: "true"
  volumes:
  - name: web-data
    emptyDir: {}
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: nginx-service
spec:
  selector:
    app: nginx
  ports:
  - protocol: TCP
    port: 80
    targetPort: 8080
```

```
apiVersion: apps/v1beta1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
spec:
  replicas: 3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx:1.9.14
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
```

```
$ kubectl set image deployment/nginx-deployment nginx=nginx:1.13.5 deployment "nginx-deployment" image updated
```
